definition.name: AI Issue and Comment Moderator
definition.description: Scan new issues and comments with GitHub Models AI prompts; label or hide spam automatically.
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: GitHub token with `issues`, `pull-requests`, and `models: read` permissions

inputs.name: spam-label
inputs.description: Label to add when generic spam is detected

inputs.name: ai-label
inputs.description: Label to add when AI-generated content is detected

inputs.name: minimize-detected-comments
inputs.description: Whether to minimize comments detected as spam

inputs.name: dry-run
inputs.description: If true, only evaluate without adding labels or minimizing comments

inputs.name: custom-prompt-path
inputs.description: Path to a custom YAML prompt file in your repository (relative to repository root)

inputs.name: enable-link-spam-detection
inputs.description: Enable built-in link spam detection prompt

inputs.name: enable-ai-detection
inputs.description: Enable built-in AI-generated content detection prompt

inputs.name: endpoint
inputs.description: The endpoint to use for inference
